item.title: Heat Advisories will be needed across the lowlands Thursday
item.description: Heat Advisories will be needed across the lowlands Thursday and Friday afternoons, as health impacts remain possible to vulnerable populations, as well as those working or recreating outdoors. Actions: 1. Drink plenty of water. 2. Wear light, loose fitting clothing. 3. Rest often in shaded or air conditioned locations. 4. Never leave children or pets unattended in vehicles. 5. Check on family and friends.

item.title: We’re not turning our backs on our farmers. Due to continued
item.description: We’re not turning our backs on our farmers. Due to continued drought conditions, I’ve extended the State of Emergency for another 30 days allowing our public agencies to continue providing water to those in need—we are here to help. I also want to remind everyone to utilize the Emergency Drought Relief Reimbursement Grant Program, which provides financial assistance to those helping secure and distribute water supplies in counties experiencing severe or extreme drought conditions. More information: https://grants.wv.gov/
